data.title: Awesome paella
data.text:
So here's what I learned. Order the shrimp solmar appetizer with the seafood paella entre.  That will feed TWO persons. That's it, that's enough. Bread for "dipping".  A bottle of red or white HOUSE wine and your in heaven!!
Very important to enter the side restaurant entrance. Not the bar entrance.

data.title: Food is Fantastic!
data.text: We went to dinner here Thursday night with another couple; the place is simple and you have to go to the back of the building to find the dining area. That being said, it was truly the BEST Paella I have ever had, and the Garlic Shrimp were simply amazing!!! We ordered for four but enough food for eight came to our table. Absolutely scrumptious, I cannot wait to go back for more shrimp!!!

data.title: Just like Portugal
data.text: Without a doubt the best Portuguese restaurant in Connecticut. Everything is fresh and cooked to order. Staff make you feel right at home from the moment you walk into the dining room or bar area. The other patrons are always friendly and make the atmosphere very comfortable. I could go on and on about the treasure but you must see for yourself.

data.title: Good Portuguese Food
data.text: Excellent codfish and squid (lulas) dishes. Also great pasarinhos (quails). Very good fresh fish dishes.
